name: Android Destruction
description:
[ENG]

This is one of my first projects i done in university. 

A simple Top-Down Shooter with 3 levels.

Controls

There is a tutorial but is in spanish

  • WASD or Arrows - Movement
  • 1 2 3 - Weapon Slots
  • Left Click - Fire Gun
  • E - Interact
  • R - Reload
  • Esc - Pause
Used Assets
  • https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii
  • https://trevor-pupkin.itch.io/tech-dungeon-roguelite

[ESP]

Este es uno de mis primeros proyectos de la facultad.

Un simple Top-Down Shooter de 3 niveles.
